description:
There's always a difficulty making IT work successfully in capital markets - there's a lot of particular problems as this particular industry is very difficult in many ways, and there is quite a gap between IT and business community. This course is designed to help professionals who are in IT or whose role deals with IT to be more successful.

This course consists of 21 lectures among 4 sections, including 3 case studies:

  • Bond Project
  • FX Front Office
  • Equity Confirmation
title: How to Make IT Work Successfully in Capital Markets
